author: crossley
msg: The "avoid" file for use with licer.pl script. See FOR-857

author: bayard
msg: "The implementation of Functions has checks for null parameters that are
redundant given coercion required by the Engine. As discussed on the mailing
list, these checks can be removed.
Some function implementations, such as replace, are now available in the JRE
allowing this class to be simplified. Also usage of StringBuffer can be
replaced with StringBuilder avoiding unneeded synchronization."

msg: HDFS-1202. DataBlockScanner throws NPE when updated before

author: bayard
msg: Adding pom changes from #49548. Hook the new TestSetSupport file up directly, and ensure the jar includes the .properties file. Patch from Jeremy Boynes
